name: Broken Core - GogodotJam 2
description:
This is a submission to the Gogodot Jam 2
This is not a finished game, nor a finished jam.
Didn't had the time I would've liked to

Enjoy the idea tho !

----------------------

YOU PLAY AS A BROKEN ROBOT WHO NEED POWER TO PROPERLY WORK
- Redirect power to walk, jump and even shoot ! 
- Core gameplay is metroidvania where you have all the power-ups, but no energy to use them !
